main event: A UFO sighting of a yellow-white object the size of a pinhead at arm's length observed on November 3, 1959.
interesting points: The object resembled a searchlight and disappeared rapidly from view., The observation lasted between 10 to 15 minutes., The sighting was made at night under a bright moon., Despite initial assumptions, the object's rapid movement indicated it was not a balloon., Observers attempted to close in on the object but lost sight of it when it moved quickly away.
